properties.entry: SELECT D_NO , D_PLACE , TO_CHAR(D_STIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') "D_STIME" , TO_CHAR(D_ETIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') "D_ETIME" , D_ELSE , D_DATE FROM DETAIL_SCHEDULE WHERE M_NO = ? AND SD_NO = ? ORDER BY D_DATE ASC, D_STIME ASC
INSERT INTO DETAIL_SCHEDULE ( D_NO , D_PLACE , D_STIME , D_ETIME , D_ELSE , D_DATE , M_NO , SD_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_D.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
